it was june .
and the sun warmed the city .
today cam was planning a trip to the water park with his uncle moe .
on the phone, at eight o'clock, his uncle moe had said, i will pick you up at ten .
cam was ready to go at nine o'clock .
he was very excited for his day with uncle moe .
cam waited outside and watched the cars go .
pops came out .
dd-dddo you have your hat ?
pop asked .
the sun will be warm .
cam did not have his hat .
he ran inside and grabbed his red and gray baseball cap with the letter on it .
cam was ready to go !
mom came out .
do you have a towel ?
mom asked .
you will get wet .
cam did not have his towel .
he ran inside and got his spiderman beach towel .
cam thought i have my hat and my towel .
what else will i need ?
cam put some coins in his pockets in case he needed money .
now he was ready to go .
he sat outside and waited for uncle moe .
he watched the buses go by .
cam looked back and forth down the street .
finally cam saw a tall man wah walking .
he the man looked at cam and lifted his chin .
cam looked at the man and lifted his chin back .
cam jumped down the steps and ran to his uncle moe .
uncle moe gave cam the rock .
ready little man uncle moe asked .
cam had his hat, his towel, and some money .
ready cam said .
cam smiled and waved to mom and pop as he and uncle moe walked the walked to the bus stop .
good job !
a garden is a place where people grow food or flowers .
gardens can be big or small .
gardens can be in the ground .
or they can be in a small pot .
gardens can be at home or at a church .
some kids have gardens at their school !
there are gardens at the white house .
the home of the president of the united states .
one garden grows food .
and the other garden is the rose garden .
you need four things to grow a garden .
a sunny spot, good soil, water, and time .
a sunny spot .
plants need sunshine to grow nice vegetables and flowers .
a spot that faces south is best .
good soil .
soil is a kind of dirt .
pile the soil up like a small hill so that the water can go down .
the pile of soil should be about twelve inches .
or the size of a ruler .
it is good for your plants if worms live in the soil .
to invite worms put cut up leaves three inches down in your soil .
soil .
water .
gardens do well if they get about one inch of rain every each week .
if it is hot and dry outside you will need to give more water to your garden .
the best test is to put your finger in the soil .
if you get mud on your hands it is too wet .
if the soil is dusty the plant needs water .
time .
some plants grow in a few weeks .
others take a few months .
you must wait and take care of your plants .
then you can enjoy the food and flowers from your garden !
the sweet potato is a root vegetable .
that means it is grown under the ground .
sweet potatos are large and sweet .
sweet potatos are long .
the skin of the sweet potato can be yellow, orange, red, brown, purple, or tan .
on the inside, the sweet potato can be tan, white, red, yellow .
it is not very sweet .
the sweet potato will taste sweeter if it is red, pink, or orange .
there are many ways to cook a sweet potato .
you can bake it in the oven .
you can make sweet potato fries .
you can even make sweet potato pie !
jonetta's big brother, jamal, reads lots of books .
jonetta reads too but sometimes she just plays with her cat .
one day her brother came home from school with a top reader prize .
jamal was very happy .
mom and dad were pleased .
jonetta was happy too but she also wanted to be a top reader .
you must read five or more books in a week .
i will help .
mom took them to the library to get lots of books .
jamal helped his sister read the books .
the next week jonetta got a top readers prize .
fanafantastic !
let's read lots of books every week so you both will always be top readers !
alright .
that's all the reading we had .
you're a super reader .
great job .
thanks .
really good job !
thanks !
